name: Mrs._Thrimble%27s_Bed_and_Breakfast
text:
Mrs. Thrimble's Bed and Breakfast
Mrs. Thrimble's Bed and Breakfast was a bed and breakfast in Twin Peaks, Washington.
It was owned by Emma Thrimble, who opened it in the early 1950s. It had five rooms and three meals served from Mrs. Thrimble's own kitchen.
